body.p: The Wine development release 1.3.24 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Various DirectInput improvements.
Support for line breaking in Uniscribe.
More UI elements in builtin Shell Explorer.
Some more D3DX9 functions.
Improved support for shell known folders.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
